Sentencas: Sm3+ and Nd3+ co-doped ceria, Ce-0.85(SmxNd1-x)(0.15)O2-delta (SNDC) (x = 0.0, 0.2, 0.4, 0.6, 0.8 and 1.0) was synthesized using the urea nitrate combustion method.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterizations of Ce0.85(SmxNd1-x)0.15O2-δ ceramics

Sentencas: The synthesized powders showed the single phase of a fluorite-type structure.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterizations of Ce0.85(SmxNd1-x)0.15O2-δ ceramics

Sentencas: The SNDC were sintered to over 98% of their theoretical density at1450 degrees C for 4 h in air.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterizations of Ce0.85(SmxNd1-x)0.15O2-δ ceramics

Sentencas: The electrical properties of these ceramics were investigated in both oxidizing (air) and reducing atmospheres (25 mol% H-2 and 75 mol% N-2).
Titulo: Synthesis and characterizations of Ce0.85(SmxNd1-x)0.15O2-δ ceramics

Sentencas: Ce0.85(Sm0.6Nd0.4)(0.15)O-2-(delta) (SNDC (x = 0.6)) had the highest conductivity and the lowest activation energy in air, with the values of 0.018 S cm(-1) and 0.527 eV at 550 degrees C, respectively.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterizations of Ce0.85(SmxNd1-x)0.15O2-δ ceramics

Sentencas: Furthermore, in reducing atmosphere, the SNDC (x = 0.6) showed the slowest oxygen surface exchange.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterizations of Ce0.85(SmxNd1-x)0.15O2-δ ceramics

Sentencas: In addition, characterization of SNDC at the actual solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) operation conditions indicated that co-doped ceria materials had larger transference number of oxygen ions than singly doped ones.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterizations of Ce0.85(SmxNd1-x)0.15O2-δ ceramics

Sentencas: And among them, the SNDC (x = 0.6) had the largest value.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterizations of Ce0.85(SmxNd1-x)0.15O2-δ ceramics

Sentencas: Therefore, the ratio of Sm3+ to Nd3+ does have significant effect on the electrical properties of SNDC.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterizations of Ce0.85(SmxNd1-x)0.15O2-δ ceramics

Sentencas: And the SNDC with x = 0.6 is supposed to be the optimum composition.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterizations of Ce0.85(SmxNd1-x)0.15O2-δ ceramics
Synthesis and characterizations of Ce0.85(SmxNd1-x)0.15O2-δ ceramics
Synthesis and characterizations of Ce0.85(SmxNd1-x)0.15O2-δ ceramics
